mapper.insert: INSERT INTO approval_history ( approval_num, proc_id, position_cd, status_code, his_reg_date ) SELECT #{num}, e.user_id, e.position_cd, 'PND', NOW() FROM approval_emp e WHERE e.user_id = #{writerId}

INSERT INTO approval_history ( approval_num, proc_id, position_cd, status_code, his_reg_date ) SELECT #{num}, e.user_id, e.position_cd, #{statusCode}, NOW() FROM approval_emp e WHERE e.user_id = #{procId}
mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY h.his_reg_date ASC) AS his_num, h.approval_num, e.emp_name AS proc_id, p.position_name AS position_cd, s.status_name AS status_code, h.his_reg_date FROM approval_history h LEFT JOIN approval_emp e ON h.proc_id = e.user_id LEFT JOIN positions p ON e.position_cd = p.position_cd LEFT JOIN approval_status s ON h.status_code = s.status_code WHERE h.approval_num = #{approvalNum} ORDER BY h.his_reg_date ASC
